rule.condition: not (same(current.phase in $L.file, "Logging")) and not (same(open in $L.file, "Open")) and not (same(open in $L.file, "Categorize")) and not (same(category in $L.file, "service catalog")) and not (same($G.ess, "true")) and not (same($action, "first.call.close"))
rule.conditionDesc: ( current.phase in CurrentRecord != "Logging" AND open in CurrentRecord != "Open" AND open in CurrentRecord != "Categorize" AND category in CurrentRecord != "service catalog" AND $G.ess != "true" AND $action != "first.call.close")
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Logging</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Open</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">Categorize</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Category">category</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">service catalog</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$action">$action</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="">first.call.close</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Assignment Group;Assignee are Mandatory (when ( current.phase in CurrentRecord != "Logging" AND open in CurrentRecord != "Open" AND open in CurrentRecord != "Categorize" AND category in CurrentRecord != "service catalog" AND $G.ess != "true" AND $action != "first.call.close"))

rule.condition: not (same(current.phase in $L.file, "Logging")) and not (same($G.ess, "true")) and not (same($action, "first.call.close"))
rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Current Phase">current.phase</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Logging</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$action">$action</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">first.call.close</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Subcategory are Mandatory (when ( current.phase in CurrentRecord != "Logging" AND $G.ess != "true" AND $action != "first.call.close"))

rule.conditionXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.folderEntitlement">$G.folderEntitlement</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$log.catalog">$log.catalog</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>

<XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="false" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="">Resolved</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
rule.fullDesc: Solution are Mandatory (when ( open in CurrentRecord = "Resolved" AND $G.ess != "true"))

rule.ruleDesc: Notify By;Impact;Urgency;Primary Contact;Title;Description;Service Recipient are Mandatory
rule.fullDesc: Notify By;Impact;Urgency;Primary Contact;Title;Description;Service Recipient are Mandatory (when ( $G.ess != "true"))
